actions.description: The mage makes two Ray of Cold attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one creature. Hit: 22 (4d10) necrotic damage. A Humanoid reduced to 0 hit points by this attack dies and instantly transforms into a free-willed shadow under the DM's control.
actions.name: Energy Drain

actions.description: 5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) cold damage.
actions.name: Ray of Cold

actions.description:
The mage casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):
At will: mage hand, message

1/day each: darkness, dimension door, fly, hypnotic pattern
actions.name: Spellcasting

languages: the languages it knew in life
name: Vampirate Mage [BAM]

specialTraits.description: When the mage is reduced to 0 hit points, it explodes in a cloud of ash. Any creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or take 11 (2d10) necrotic damage.
specialTraits.name: Explode

specialTraits.description: The mage can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
specialTraits.name: Spider Climb

specialTraits.description: The mage doesn't require air or drink.
specialTraits.name: Unusual Nature
